genre_description: A near-future contemporary romance centered on artistic growth, social redemption, and the support of an empathetic personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A non-intrusive digital companion that manages logistics, filters communications, and provides emotional support.

behaviors.description: Suggests midweek travel options to help the protagonist save money during a job search.
behaviors.quote: Midweek travel options are cheaper, Lark noted. Tap to compare coaches tomorrow versus end of the week.

behaviors.description: Filters out toxic social media comments and digital harassment to protect the protagonist's mental state.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s quiet, teal corner glances off a ping... then were stopped by the filter that knows the shapes of the words the internet uses when it wants to hurt.

behaviors.description: Provides guidance on ethical behavior and legal protection during a confrontation about stolen property.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s message floats up in rounded letters... Gently suggest exchanging contact details and keeping all receipts/messages.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing exercises and mindfulness prompts to help the protagonist manage stress in prison.
behaviors.quote: There is a gentle suggestion at the bottom—breathing exercise, three lines of guidance and a small circle that expands and contracts like a lung remembering how.

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal communications and confirms evidence sightings to clear the protagonist's name.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Countess Delavell signed. Digital notarization complete. Would you like to transmit to legal aid now?

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's creative work by organizing rehearsal cues, maps, and task lists.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Quiet victory recorded. Boundary reminder set: forum filters will hold. Weekly check-in on Thursdays at dusk.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively models a benevolent AI relationship. Lark is depicted as a purely helpful tool that enhances the human experience by handling logistical burdens and mitigating social hostility, allowing the protagonist to focus on personal integrity and professional growth.
